data.author: CBS News
data.title: Starbucks reverses its open-door policy, requiring people to make a purchase if they want to stay
data.description: MGN Starbucks is reversing its open-door policy after almost seven years, now requiring that people make a purchase if they want to hang out at its coffee shops or use its restrooms. The coffee giant said on Monday that a new code of conduct – which will be posted in all company-owned North American stores – will also ban discrimination...

data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: China weighs sale of TikTok US to Elon Musk
data.description: Musk’s X — formerly Twitter — would take control of TikTok US and run the businesses together.

data.title: US: Experts debunk five claims about LA wildfires
data.description: Tribune OnlineUS: Experts debunk five claims about LA wildfiresAs ‘devastating’ wildfires continue to spread across Southern California, experts claim that misinformation has also been circulating at alarming rates. Here are five key claims about the fires and the response, with factual clarifications provided by experts and officials: Claim: Gov.
